text: Hi everyone! Is there a way to present the site search results in a pop-up rather than being directed to the system page? Any ideas on that? Thank you :slightly_smiling_face:
I was about to create a JS client for loading in these results
Should be available in a few minutes
So you can just create a module with a search input and on search uses that client to pull in the data and load it into a popup
Let me know if you have any issues
Anyone know what <http://api.hubapi.com|api.hubapi.com> returned (460) is in Zapier? Or what a 460 error is specifically

Any ideas as to how to use a HubSpot cta with a complex link destination with js such as `<a class="play-video" data-lity="" href="<https://vimeo.com/248380726/73a56682ff?utm_campaign=Video%20Campaigns&utm_source=Website&utm_medium=Home%20Page>">`

tried wrapping hubl in an a tag but it doesnt like that! thanks.

What is the best way to make a module smart at the template level in the new IDE? I'm trying to rotate advertisements on my blog listing page here: <http://blog.nutrislice.com/>  (bottom left hand corner). Are there any best practices here?
460 HTTP error is a timeout error.  Server received a client connection but the client closed connection before the idle timeout elapsed.
if you have Zapier ingrations, make sure to jump in and reauthenticate it ... after a year of notice, they finally cut off oAuth1 support. So you just need to jump in and reconnect (now using oAuth2)
